short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VerifyTreatment instantly checks insurance benefits, while your patient is still on the phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VerifyTreatment is pleased to announce the first ever eligibility and benefits extension for Google Chrome. 

Instantly verify patient eligibility and benefits on any webpage.

VerifyTreatment is a cloud-based health insurance verification platform that accelerates the admissions process. It searches and queries 1000's of the leading health plans in the U.S., ensuring immediate verification of benefits.

Our single sign-on applications is easy-to-use. Available in real-time and allows you to accept new patients upon request.

• Single sign-on access to 1,000’s of insurance plans
• Available remotely from anywhere, on any device
• Access in-depth coverage and carve-out details
• Lead generating custom webform integration
• Auto VOB-Monitoring helps prevent lapses
• Track insurance claims and payouts
• And so much more!

No contracts | Get started in minutes | Free download
verifytx.com
